bibl.title: New Testament Studies and Papyrology: What Can We Learn from Each Other?

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. What Can New Testament Scholars Learn from Papyrology? [Considers in part. P. Harrauer 2]. - 3. What Can Papyrologists Lear from New Testament Studies?: a. Theory and Data; - b. Greek Grammatical Study. - 4. Conclusion.
